analysis.narrative:

Quantitative data shows 80% bullish Twitter, 64% bullish news, 100% bullish YouTube/professional trader, but qualitative analysis reveals significant macro headwinds.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) AI infrastructure and productivity tailwinds driving selective tech strength, (2) Crypto institutional adoption and regulatory normalization supporting digital assets, (3) Sector bifurcation with rotation from growth to defensive positioning amid guidance disappointments and valuation concerns.

ðŸŽ¯ **Levels:** SPY ($684 Max Pain): Call walls and put walls create option-driven support. QQQ ($619 Max Pain): Options structure suggests dealer positioning around this level. VIX at 13.77 indicates low volatility environment. Per Twitter: /ES futures support mentioned around 6847 (separate from SPY which trades ~$680s). Watch for tech rotation signals and defensive sector strength.
key_themes: Crypto institutional adoption and regulatory clarity
Sector rotation from growth to defensive positioning
Fed policy trajectory and rate cut expectations
risk_factors: Stagflation scenario from fiscal dominance and commodity dynamics
Tech valuation extremes and earnings guidance disappointments
Employment data weakness validating macro deterioration
Banking sector regulatory capital pressures and fintech earnings revisions
analysis.intraday_levels: Limited intraday-specific levels provided. /ES futures support per Twitter analysis. SPY gravitating toward $684 Max Pain level. Watch for early session volatility given Christmas Day thin liquidity.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY $684 Max Pain as pivot point. QQQ $619 Max Pain as key level. Monitor for rotation pressure on mega-cap tech and defensive sector strength as swing positioning develops over 1-5 day horizon.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.
